episodes.title: The Cult that Created the Troubled Teen Industry | Synanon Explained
episodes.description:
It began as a miracle cure for drug addiction—it ended with a rattlesnake in a mailbox. 🐍

In the late 1950s, Charles Dederich founded Synanon, a revolutionary rehab program that promised to save lives. But as Dederich’s power grew, his "community" transformed into a terrifying cult. From the brutal "Game" (a psychological torture session) to forced head-shaving, mass vasectomies, and the formation of a private army called the Imperial Marines, this is the rise and fall of Synanon.

More Deep Dives: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCwVMvTJD5Co8M-k1482YUJFxWnZ3XIn_&si=jzgcMMOolPxBtTT6
